page.title: 04Principal Features
page.content:
{Lower Kilcott}is a small group of houses with two farms. There is also an old water mill which has been restored. Lower Kilcott is in a valley about half a mile from Hillesley.
{PRINCIPAL FEATURES.} {C.T.Coates, Baker & Grocer.}The shop is 74 years old; it has been passed down three generations. They know most of their customers. They have deliveries Tuesdays and Wednesdays. They sell 'Mace' groceries. Behind the shop is the bakery where fresh bread is baked most days. {P.Moore, Radio & T.V.Services.}At Mr. Moores shop they know most of their customers. Their shop is very popular. They have extended the shop since they arrived. They sell colour T.V.s and other electrical things.
